类的使用
org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request.MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder

  • 使用MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request
    Contains built-in RequestBuilder implementations.

    • org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request中MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder的使用

      返回MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder的org.springframework.test.web.servlet.request中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder.file(MockMultipartFile file)
      Add the given MockMultipartFile.
      MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder.file(java.lang.String name, byte[] content)
      Create a new MockMultipartFile with the given content.
      static MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMvcRequestBuilders.fileUpload(java.lang.String urlTemplate, java.lang.Object... uriVars)
      已过时。 
      in favor of MockMvcRequestBuilders.multipart(String, Object...)
      static MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMvcRequestBuilders.fileUpload(java.net.URI uri)
      已过时。 
      in favor of MockMvcRequestBuilders.multipart(URI)
      static MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMvcRequestBuilders.multipart(java.lang.String urlTemplate, java.lang.Object... uriVars)
      Create a MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder for a multipart request.
      static MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMvcRequestBuilders.multipart(java.net.URI uri)
      Create a MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder for a multipart request.
      MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder MockMultipartHttpServletRequestBuilder.part(Part... parts)
      Add Part components to the request.
